messages.content: What is the purpose of the lora-info custom node in ComfyUI?
The lora-info custom node in ComfyUI shows Lora Base Model, Trigger Words and Examples by pulling data from CivitAI.
Who is credited for doing the hard work in developing the lora-info custom node?
badjeff is credited for doing the actual hard work in developing the lora-info custom node for ComfyUI.
How can users install the lora-info custom node in ComfyUI?

Users can install the lora-info custom node in ComfyUI by either using ComfyUI Manager to search for 'lorainfo' or 'jitcoder' and clicking install, cloning the GitHub repository in ComfyUI/custom-nodes, or downloading the repo as a zip and extracting it in the custom-nodes directory.
Which YouTube creators have made tutorials for the lora-info custom node?
Joe Conway and 스페이스 플라워 have made YouTube tutorials for the lora-info custom node.
How many nodes are included in the lora-info repository?
The lora-info repository contains two nodes: Lora Info and Image From URL.
What is the purpose of the Image From URL node?

The Image From URL node loads an image from a given URL and makes it available for use in ComfyUI workflows, making it easier for users to share workflows without having to download images separately.
Where can users find a preview image of the lora-info custom node in action?
Users can find a preview image of the lora-info custom node in action in the README file of the lora-info repository.
